summary: Enhanced both test files from 12 to 47 tests. All pass. Comprehensive coverage of NotificationSubscriber, QuickPayButtons, and useNotifications hook.
coverage_areas: NotificationSubscriber: status indicator, start/stop listening, onLog calls, error display, waiting state, subscribe failures
QuickPayButtons: renders buttons, pre-fills address, disables without address, sends payments, loading state, error display
useNotifications: starts unsubscribed, subscribe/unsubscribe, cleanup on unmount, null client error, subscribe failure, notification callback, balance refresh
